title: Bec Hewitt debuts new hairstyle during rare family outing Lleyton and children
text:
Bec Hewitt debuted a brand new hairstyle in Melbourne on Tuesday afternoon.

During a family day out with husband Lleyton and their three children, the 36-year-old star oozed sophistication with her sleek new brunette do'.

The former Home and Away star ditched her long blonde locks for the fresh style.

Crossing over the dark side! Bec Hewitt debuted her new brown short hair during a rare family outing with her husband Lleyton and their three children in Melbourne on Tuesday

Big change: Her new do' (left) is a big change for Bec, who has rocked longer blonde locks for years (right)

Bec's silky long bob was parted down the middle and straightened for the outing.

The star dressed casually in skinny blue jeans, a comfortable grey t-shirt and designer black trainers while running errands with her brood.

Retired professional tennis player Lleyton, 38, led the family during their day out.

Mother and daughter! After ditching the blonde, Bec's silky long bob was parted down the middle and straightened for the outing. Pictured: Bec with youngest daughter Ava, eight

The couple were joined by children Mia, 13, Cruz, ten, and little Ava, eight.

Despite being just 13-years-old, Mia is almost reaching the same height as her famous mother now.

Last year, Bec spoke about the close bond she shares with her eldest daughter.

The former soap actress revealed she was constantly learning from Mia, who she described as being wise 'beyond her years'.

Close bond! Bec, 36, and retired Australian professional tennis player Lleyton, 38, were joined by their three children Mia (left), 13, Cruz (centre), ten, and little Ava (right), eight

Growing up! Despite being just 13, Mia is almost reaching the same height as her mother now

'I'm a real believer that our kids are here to teach us as much as we teach them,' she wrote on Instagram, marking her daughter's thirteenth birthday.

'I am always learning from Mia! How to be patient, how to be positive and how to be a better person.'

Bec concluded: '[Mia] is wise beyond her years! Such a kind, gentle, intelligent, calm yet bubbly person to be around!'

'I am always learning from Mia': Last year, Bec spoke about the close bond she shares with her eldest daughter

Bec and Lleyton, who are now back living in Melbourne after several years in the Bahamas, tied the knot in lavish ceremony in July 2005.

At the time, she was a major TV star but has since turned her back on the spotlight to focus on raising her family.

Despite endless tabloid rumours suggesting their relationship is in 'crisis', it is believed the Hewitts are happily married.

authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
